inclusion.criterion: Prior Sigmoidoscopy sub score of at least 2, and disease that extended 15 cm or more from the anal verge
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must have required CS for treatment of their symptoms within 2 weeks of diagnosis and have not reached symptom adequate response and they still have moderate to severe disease, indicated by a Mayo score 6 - 12
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: In subjects that enroll and are eligible to continue in the study, study drug needs to be started within 3 months of the subject starting corticosteroids
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Currently treated with either anti-TNF therapy, immunomodulators or methotrexate due to the severity of their condition, making them not appropriate for vedolizumab
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Toxic megacolon, abdominal abscess, symptomatic colonic stricture, an increased risk of infectious complications
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: An anticipated requirement for major surgery, colonic dysplasia or adenomas and malignant neoplasms
exclusion.label: not_met
